footer.newsletter_subscribe: Subscribe to our weekly newsletter so you don't miss anything, it's completely free.

about.introduction: 5nbirk project was developed together by Ahmet Bora Özaras and İsmailcan Uslu. While Bora took care of HTML, CSS, JavaScript and partly React in front-end development, İsmail took on the task of developing API calls in the React part and RESTful API development with Spring Boot in the back-end. While the structures we used at the beginning of the project were quite primitive, we built more up-to-date and secure systems over time.
about.prompt: 5nbirk is a forum and blog application designed by Bora. One of the most important lessons we learned during the project was how critical communication was, as well as project development and planning. We experienced both challenging and fun aspects of group work. As a result, this project not only taught us technical skills, but also showed us the importance of teamwork.
about.final: We are proud to have implemented this project and we hope you enjoy 5nbirk!

signUp.description: We write articles, take photos, shoot videos, discuss among ourselves and interact with artificial intelligence.
